email.title: DoCSoc breakfast! Sponsored by Next Jump
email.text: Come along for a **free** breakfast with us this Friday 24th Jan! Start the day off right with some feasty pastries and hot drinks. Generously sponsored by NextJumpers who will be there for a laid-back mingle in a nice setting.
email.heading: DoCSoc breakfast! Sponsored by Next Jump

event.text:
Finish your week off with one of DoCSoc's free breakfasts - generously sponsored by Next Jump! Come along to Huxley 217/218 any time between 9am-10:45am to enjoy a great pre-lecture breakfast with other DoCSoc'ers. So come on over, have a snack and meet with engineers from Next Jump!
If you have any specific dietary requirements, please let us know a few days beforehand!
